thread.section_title: e-Careers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of e-Careers | e-careers.com
thread.title: C Briggs

author: C Briggs
title: C Briggs
text:
I've taken the ECDL course over the past year.
The online learning format has been very useful for me. Everything was broken down into bite size pieces which enabled me to just go in and do a little bit each day during my lunch break,
The ECDL course has been very useful. The content of some modules were more familiar to me than others, some things I use in my job everyday. Other modules I didn't know much about and the ECDL was very useful to me in becoming familar with them.
I'll certainly use E-Careers again, I like the online learning format which enables me to do the courses as and when I have time to do so.
